channel.title: filebeat on Jorge Luis Betancourt
channel.description: Recent content in filebeat on Jorge Luis Betancourt

item.title: Web UI for testing dissect patterns
item.description: If you have been using Filebeat to ship your logs around (usually to Elasticsearch) you know that Filebeat doesn't support Grok patterns (like Logstash does). Instead, Filebeat advocates the usage of the dissect processor. I like the dissect processor tokenization syntax. It is easy to understand and usually quite fast at processing. This blog post is not about the decision of not supporting Grok patterns in Filebeat. If you work with Logstash (and use the grok filter).
